text: My boss decided to host a mini buffet for our team with less than 15 people after training. I was pleasantly surprised that the food is yummy delicious and they could do catering for about 14 people. First time trying out their buffet. We have a great time bonding in a small group.

Great service, great set up and great food! Thank you Wayne and team for taking in my last minute order and being so patient to all my queries/changes. The recommendation of food to select was yummy! Will definitely order again! 😃

Ordered the “Your Usual Suspect” catering for 30pax and the entire experience was great! Online ordering was easy and fuss free, and they got back to me the next day to confirm my order. Melvin who came to help set up the buffet was punctual, friendly and very patient in helping us decide the table set up given the space constraints we had. The food was tasty- garlic ebiko fried rice was full of garlic fragrance, chicken rendang was very flavourful (but may be on the spicy side for some) and the taste of nonya chap chye took us my surprise too! Not forgetting the red velvet cream cheese and rich walnut brownie. Iced lemon tea was not diluted/watered down like other caterers. All in all, an extremely value for money quality catering that I’ll definitely engage again :)

Follow @nomninjas on IG, FB and Lemon8 for more💕 … Almost went for Chilli Manis but went for Katong Catering instead because of price (cheaper delivery) and more value + interesting menu!
…
they have limited slots for each day but it’s really worth it to go for them!  💯 HALAL 💯 Quantity of food is more than what the pax amt  💯 friendly staff when i call to check up on the delivery time  💯 on time even though it was raining!  💯 food came hot  💯 more affordable delivery fee!
Ordered a buffet catering for friends. Thumbs up. Value for money and extremely tasty. There is something for someone to rave about.
